page.title: 07Kennoway Primary School -2
page.content: { "To be a school at the heart of it's {community"}is the declared aim of Kennoway Primary School. Working together, the{School and the {Parent's Association}have forged links of partnership and through shared experiences both within the school day and in extra-currricular activities, sound school/home relations now exist. The Association works hard to promote home/school relations in a variety of ways; in running a weekly coffee morning and thrift shop; in organising various social events and raising funds and in promoting craft activities in the middle school. The commitment of the parents and the school has brought about a new sense of vigour and vitality in the daily life of the school. Both parties realise that these relations, now in existence, must be nurtured.
